overview: Steve arrives looking for the person printing counterfeit bonds. He finds his man in Pop Ryland who has two sons and a stepson. The stepson doesn't want to be an outlaw like the other sons and helps Steve out by posing as the Durango Kid when needed and then leading him to the evidence he is looking for.
tagline: THE DURANGO KID and SMILEY OUT-GUN RANGE OUTLAWS
title: Buckaroo from Powder River
